item.title: LSU sits atop Preseason FPI 1.0
item.description:
LSU sits atop Preseason FPI 1.0

National signing day is complete, which means it's time to start looking ahead to the 2016 college football season. It also means there is enough information for ESPN Stats & Information to run its initial Preseason Football Power Index (FPI) to determine the best and worst teams heading into next season.

item.title: Former Texas A&M LB defends program over Allen's criticism
item.description:
Former Texas A&M LB defends program over Allen's criticism

A day after former Texas A&M quarterback Kyle Allen bashed the program over what were perceived as culture problems, former linebacker Sean Porter took to Twitter and demonstrated some other thoughts on the subject. Porter -- now a member of the Jacksonville Jaguars -- was Johnny Manziel's teammate during the 2012 season.

item.title: Matt Mosley: I don't buy 'Johnny Manziel culture' as the reason Kyle Allen left Texas A&M | SportsDay
item.description:
Matt Mosley: I don't buy 'Johnny Manziel culture' as the reason Kyle Allen left Texas A&M | SportsDay

Just when you thought things couldn't get worse for Johnny Manziel, Kyle Allen is basically blaming him for the quarterback exodus that took place in College Station. In his first extensive interview since transferring to the University of Houston, Allen described a culture in the post-Johnny era that wasn't conducive to winning.

item.title: Post-signing day SEC Power Rankings
item.description:
Post-signing day SEC Power Rankings

Now that national signing day has come and gone, SEC rosters are starting to take shape.

item.title: Von Miller named MVP of Super Bowl 50
item.description:
Von Miller named MVP of Super Bowl 50

One of the great Aggie linebackers and former Butkus Award winner Von Miller needs more room on his trophy case, as he was just named the Most Valuable Player of Super Bowl 50. He began the game with a hearty "Thanks and gig 'em" to Aggies everywhere, and then he promptly dominated the Carolina Panthers' offensive line and NFL MVP Cam Newton.

item.title: What Texas A&M's Kevin Sumlin Must Do to Save His Job in 2016
item.description:
What Texas A&M's Kevin Sumlin Must Do to Save His Job in 2016

If you see Texas A&M head coach Kevin Sumlin squirming a little bit while sitting down this offseason, don't be alarmed. He's just trying to look and remain calm while sitting on the hottest seat in the country.

item.title: A&M offensive staff never was on same page in 2015 - Gridiron Now
item.description:
A&M offensive staff never was on same page in 2015 - Gridiron Now

Texas A&M dismissed offensive line coach Dave Christensen on Sunday, and insiders tell GN the move wasn't a surprise because Christensen's arrival led to staff dissension in 2015. Christensen doubled as the Aggies' run game coordinator, and insiders say not every offensive staff member's ideas about the running game meshed.

item.title: SEC numbers crunching - Gridiron Now
item.description:
SEC numbers crunching - Gridiron Now

One thing that stuck out from National Signing Day - well, other than Alabama's continued dominance - was the class put together by Georgia. Smart was announced as Georgia's new coach on December 6, and less than two months later, he and his staff had signed the No.
